name: Space Shot (DokiDok1)
description:
Space Shot is a Shoot 'Em Up game with combining space theme & basic shape objects. Destroy enemies as much as you can.

How to:

- Move your character with WASD or arrow button on keyboard.

- Shot with left-mouse click button

- Use your mouse to aim your shot

- Heal your character with picking green thing

- Increase your shot damage with picking yellow thing

This is sample of my Shoot 'Em Up game work. This project is fulfill my portfolio purpose.
